title: How to Make an Oatmeal Pie

steps.headline: Line the pie pan with the pie dough.
Spray inside of the pie crust with nonstick cooking spray.
Add butter and white sugar to mixing bowl and beat together.
Add the vanilla and salt and beat again.
Add the dark corn syrup and uncooked oatmeal and beat until smooth.
Pour batter into pastry line pie plate.

text: Line the pie pan with the pie dough.  Flute the pie crust edges.  Spray inside of the pie crust with nonstick cooking spray.  Add butter and white sugar to mixing bowl and beat together.  Add the eggs and beat.  Add the vanilla and salt and beat again.  Add the dark corn syrup and uncooked oatmeal and beat until smooth.  Pour batter into pastry line pie plate.  Bake at 350 °F (177 °C) for 1 hour.  Finished.
